LocationName: City of Sault Ste. Marie Curb Side Yard Waste Collection
ShortDescription: The City of Sault Ste. Marie provides bi-weekly collection of leaf and yard waste, which is processed into compost. There is no bag limit for leaf and yard waste.
LongDescription: Visit the website to view the current pickup schedules for your address.

ShortDescription: Accepts a variety of hazardous waste items.

LongDescription: The shelter welcomes a number of items to give the animals some comfort and pleasure.

ShortDescription: A locally owned and operated business supplying organic compost.
The Orange Drop Program provides Ontario residents with a free, safe and easy way to dispose of household products that require special handling.
